content: apologies if this has been asked, but when is the call deciding on London HF block numbers is taking place?

author: sky.cactus
content: <#745077610685661265> and the calls are every other Friday (next one in about 12 hours or so, don't quote me on that exact time).

author: schone_wizard
content: thank you! is that the call in which the hf block numbers would be decided on tho?

author: jgm
content:
When runtime verification carried out their analysis of the deposit contract they included gas costs (specifically, for my purposes, the maximum gas cost of the `deposit` call) in section 4 of https://raw.githubusercontent.com/runtimeverification/deposit-contract-verification/master/deposit-contract-verification.pdf  

I assume these numbers will have changed with the Berlin hardfork.  Could the EF perhaps ping runtime verification to provide an update, so this new maximum value can be used when depositing?
